actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 30, title 28, United States Code, so as to place certain restrictions on the exercise of contempt powers by the United States Bankruptcy Court.

summary.text: Prohibits a judge of the United States Bankruptcy Court from punishing a civil contempt in an environmental dispute involving an officer or employee of a State or local government where such person is exercising good faith discretion in an official capacity.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 30, title 28, United States Code, so as to place certain restrictions on the exercise of contempt powers by the United States Bankruptcy Court.
